sentences.sentence: The types of driers and the products upon which they are used are generally
sentences.translation: 以下是一般常用的干燥器以及用这些干燥器来生产的产品

sentences.sentence: You may go to the laundry room on the first floor in your apartment. There you can find washers and driers.
sentences.translation: 你可以去公寓一楼的洗衣房，那儿有洗衣机和烘干机供您使用。

sentences.sentence: Most Japanese homes are fitted with such contraptions, many of which have added features including water massage, driers and self-cleaning systems.
sentences.translation: 大多数日本家族都安装了这种玩意儿，很多还增设了水流按摩、烘干和自净功能。
